05.16.13 64 words 1 min read

Life prospective

It’s amazing how quickly things can get out of prospective. It’s easy to see all the bad that you have in life and none of the good. It is really inspiring that such young people can demonstrate such maturity in the face of such a young death. If I can be half of the person Zach is, I will really proud of myself.
